row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PRV.PROMPTSET.CREATE_SERVICE
row.description: Create service instance in Cloud Foundry

row.xui: <dialog height="424" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="0" top="0" width="441"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="Create service"><properties><entry name="text">Create service</entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties></readpanel></dialog>
